title: Non-Profit Discount Request
description: A representative from a registered non-profit organization inquires about special pricing.

tasks.description: Explain the non-profit discount program and its eligibility requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the company's non-profit policy.

tasks.description: Request documentation to verify the organization's non-profit status (e.g., 501(c)(3) letter).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent requests the necessary verification documents.

tasks.description: Once verified, provide the customer with a unique discount code to use during checkout.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the verified organization with their discount.
